title: National Employment Dispute Resolution Act of 2000 (NEDRA)
content: Mandates that any Federal agency or court : (1) establish an internal dispute resolution mechanism that provides, as a voluntary option, employee-disputant access to external third-party certified mediators. And (2) participate in mediation in specified circumstances. Prescribes mediation guidelines. States that attorneys and consultants are legally obligated to advise their clients of the mediation alternative and their obligations to participate in good faith.
